Opening a Crypto Wallet

Download App
Get the official Trust Wallet app on your device.
Create Wallet
Open the app and press 'Create a new wallet'.
Back Up
Secure your secret phrase carefully offline.
Verify
Enter the security phrase to confirm backup.
Confirm
Arrange words in correct order to finish setup.
Complete
Your secure crypto wallet is now ready!

Buy Cryptocurrency

Select Crypto
Choose the cryptocurrency you want to buy.
Amount
Enter the amount you want to purchase.
Providers
Select from the best rates available.
Select
Choose your preferred provider.
Finalize
Follow the instructions to complete purchase.
Done
Your crypto will arrive shortly.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about crypto betting
How long do cryptocurrency withdrawals take?

Cryptocurrency withdrawals are processed instantly and appear in your wallet within minutes after blockchain confirmation. No waiting days like traditional banking.

Do I need to verify my identity (KYC)?

No! One of the biggest advantages of crypto betting is complete anonymity. You can deposit, bet, and withdraw without providing any personal documents.

Are there any fees for deposits or withdrawals?

We charge 0% commission on all crypto transactions. You only pay minimal blockchain network fees, which are typically under $1.

What cryptocurrencies do you support?

We support 30+ cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Tether (USDT), BNB, Solana (SOL), Litecoin (LTC), Dogecoin (DOGE), and many more.

Is there a minimum or maximum bet amount?

We have no deposit or withdrawal limits! Bet as small or as big as you want. Your funds, your rules.

How secure are crypto transactions?

Crypto transactions are secured by blockchain technology with military-grade encryption. We also use cold storage for 95% of funds and 2FA authentication for maximum security.

Still have questions? Contact our 24/7 support
